translation.en: One of the things that defines a TEDster is you've taken your passion, and you've turned it into stewardship.
translation.zh: 有一件事 定义了TED的参与者 那就是你充满激情 并且你有条不紊地进行管理

translation.en: You actually put action to the issues you care about.
translation.zh: 你确实对你关心的问题付出很多

translation.en: But what you're going to find eventually is you may need to actually get elected officials to help you out.
translation.zh: 但你会发现 你需要选举委员会 让你的议题脱颖而出

translation.en: So, how do you do that?
translation.zh: 那么你如何做到呢？

translation.en: One of the things I should probably tell you is, I worked for the Discovery Channel early in my career, and that sort of warped my framework.
translation.zh: 我可以告诉你一件事 我曾在探索发现频道工作过一段时间 那段经历扭转了我的思维框架

translation.en: So, when you start to think about politicians, you've got to realize these are strange creatures.
translation.zh: 所以当你一想到政客 你必须意识到他们是奇怪的生物

translation.en: Other than the fact that they can't tell directions, and they have very strange breeding habits, how do you actually work with these things? (Laughter) What we need to understand is: What drives the political creature?
translation.zh: 而不仅仅是他们没有方向感 而且他们的觅食习性很奇怪 究竟你该如何和他们相处。 我们需要知道的是： 是什么驱动着政治的生物

translation.en: And there are two things that are primary in a politician's heart: One is reputation and influence.
translation.zh: 在政客心中有两个基本的信条 第一条声望和影响

translation.en: These are the primary tools by which a politician can do his job.
translation.zh: 这些是最主要的工具 被政客用来做他的工作

translation.en: The second one -- unlike most animals, which is survival of the species -- this is preservation of self.
translation.zh: 第二条，不象其他动物， 大都是种群的幸存者 这是自我保护

translation.en: Now you may think it's money, but that's actually sort of a proxy to what I can do to preserve myself.
translation.zh: 也许你现在觉得金钱是关键 但那其实只是一个代理 诱惑我自己去做

translation.en: Now, the challenge with you moving your issue forward is these animals are getting broadcast to all the time.
translation.zh: 现在，是向前推动这个问题的时候了 这些动物整天被报道

translation.en: So, what doesn't work, in terms of getting your issue to be important?
translation.zh: 到底什么是没用的，而哪些方法又能使你的问题得到重视

translation.en: You can send them an email.
translation.zh: 你可以向他们发电子邮件

translation.en: Well, unfortunately, I've got so many Viagra ads coming at me, your email is lost.
translation.zh: 然而，非常不幸，我总是收到太多 伟哥广告 你的电子邮件丢失了

translation.en: It doesn't matter, it's spam.
translation.zh: 没关系，当作垃圾邮件

translation.en: How about you get on the phone?
translation.zh: 那么打电话行么

translation.en: Well, chances are I've got a droid who's picking up the phone, "Yes, they called, and they said they didn't like it."
translation.zh: 好吧，往往都是面对一个机器人说话 是的，他们回电话了，可他们说不喜欢这个想法

translation.en: That doesn't move.
translation.zh: 打电话行不通

translation.en: Face to face would work, but it's hard to set it up.
translation.zh: 面对面也许有用 但这实在太难安排了

translation.en: It's hard to get the context and actually get the communication to work.
translation.zh: 往往很难得到有效的回应和沟通

translation.en: Yes, contributions actually do make a difference and they set a context for having a conversation, but it takes some time to build up.
translation.zh: 是的，捐款的确可以得到回报 并且是很好的讨论话题， 但这仍需一些时日的积累。

translation.en: So what actually works?
translation.zh: 那么到底什么最有效呢

translation.en: And the answer is rather strange.
translation.zh: 答案也许相当匪夷所思

translation.en: It's a letter.
translation.zh: 这就是写信

translation.en: We live in a digital world, but we're fairly analog creatures.
translation.zh: 我们生活在一个数码时代 但我们依然是很模式化的生物

translation.en: Letters actually work.
translation.zh: 信件仍然很有用

translation.en: Even the top dog himself takes time every day to read 10 letters that are picked out by staff.
translation.zh: 即使我们总统本人 也会每天阅读十封信 由工作人员帮忙选出来

translation.en: I can tell you that every official that I've ever worked with will tell you about the letters they get and what they mean.
translation.zh: 我可以告诉大家在我工作过的每一个行政机关 都会告诉你他们收到过的信 和他们的意义

translation.en: So, how are you going to write your letter?
translation.zh: 所以你为什么不写封信呢

translation.en: First of all, you're going to pick up an analog device: a pen.
translation.zh: 首先，你要找一个传统的设备──钢笔

translation.en: I know these are tough, and you may have a hard time getting your hand bent around it, (Laughter) but this is actually critical.
translation.zh: 我知道你会经历一段困难时期 去适应如何正确握笔 但这真的是非常重要的

translation.en: And it is critical that you actually handwrite your letter.
translation.zh: 最重要的是 你要亲笔写这封信

translation.en: It is so novel to see this, that somebody actually picked up an analog device and has written to me.
translation.zh: 这简直太少见了 有人竟然拿起这个古老工具 写信给我

translation.en: Second of all, I'm going to recommend that you get into a proactive stance and write to your elected officials at least once a month.
translation.zh: 其次，我将给你们推荐 如何使用一种积极的姿态 每月至少给机关负责人写一封信

translation.en: Here's my promise to you: If you are consistent and do this, within three months the elected official will start calling you when that issue comes up and say, "What do you think?"
translation.zh: 在这儿我向你保证 如果你坚持这么做 不到三个月相关单位会开始给你打电话 一旦有关问题发生的时候，会问你，“您是怎么看这个问题的”

translation.en: Now, I'm going to give you a four paragraph format to work with.
translation.zh: 现在，我将建议你采用以下格式写信 使用四段落结构

translation.en: Now, when you approach these animals, you need to understand there's a dangerous end to them, and you also need to approach them with some level of respect and a little bit of wariness.
translation.zh: 当你接近这些动物的时候 你需要知道接近他们的危险性 你又必须接近他们 带一定的尊敬和一点点的谨慎

translation.en: So in paragraph number one, what I'm going to tell you to do is very simply this: You appreciate them.
translation.zh: 所以在第一段 我给你的建议非常简单 奉承他们

translation.en: You may not appreciate the person, you may not appreciate anything else, but maybe you appreciate the fact that they've got a tough gig.
translation.zh: 你也许并不欣赏对方个人，你也不喜欢他们任何其他东西 但你可以恭维他们有一份苦差事

translation.en: When animals are going to make a point, they make the point.
translation.zh: 当动物想要得到什么，他们就去得到它

translation.en: They don't spend a lot of time dicking around.
translation.zh: 他们不会花时间来回徘徊

translation.en: So, here you go. (Laughter) Paragraph number two: You may actually have to just get very blunt and say what's really on your mind.
translation.zh: 所以你的机会来了 第二段 实际上你可以单刀直入 表明你心中的立场

translation.en: When you do this, don't attack people; you attack tactics.
translation.zh: 当你这么做的时候 不要攻击任何人 要对事不对人

translation.en: Ad hominem attacks will get you nowhere.
translation.zh: 人身攻击会让你失去回旋余地

translation.en: Paragraph number three: When animals are attacked or cornered, they will fight to the death, so you have to give them an exit.
translation.zh: 第三段 当动物受到攻击或威胁时 他们会誓死反抗 所以你要给他们一个出口

translation.en: Most of the time, if they have an exit strategy, they should take it.
translation.zh: 大部分时间，如果他们发现了一条退路，他们会选择全身而退

translation.en: "Obviously, you're intelligent.
translation.zh: 显然你很高明

translation.en: If you had the right information, you would have done the right thing." (Laughter) Lastly, you want to be the nurturing agent.
translation.zh: 一旦你拥有正确的情报 你将做出正确的决定 然后你想成为培训专家

translation.en: You're the safe place to come in to.
translation.zh: 你成为了可以投靠的安全地带

translation.en: So, in paragraph number four, you're going to tell people, "If no one is providing you with this information, let me help." (Laughter) Animals do displays. They do two things: They warn you or they try to attract you and say, "We need to mate."
translation.zh: 所以在第四段 你将告诉人们 ”如果没人向你们提供这些信息，我来帮你“ 动物很喜欢炫耀，他们只干两件事 警告你或者试图攻击你 然后说：“求合体”

translation.en: You're going to do that by the way you sign your letter.
translation.zh: 你将通过签署这封信署名的时候告诉他们

translation.en: You do a number of things: you're a vice president, you volunteer, you do something else.
translation.zh: 你做过的一些项目，你是一个副主管 你是志愿者，你做过的一些其他事

translation.en: Why is is this important?
translation.zh: 为什么这很重要

translation.en: Because this establishes the two primary criteria for the political creature: that you have influence in a large sphere, and that my preservation depends on you.
translation.zh: 因为这表明了两点 政治动物最主要的评判标准 那就是你有大的影响力 还有我的政绩要依靠你

translation.en: Here is one very quick hack, especially for the feds in the audience.
translation.zh: 这里有你个很有用的小技巧 特别对于台下TED的听众

translation.en: Here's how you mail your letter.
translation.zh: 你应该这样寄你的亲笔信

translation.en: First of all, you send the original to the district office.
translation.zh: 首先，你把原件寄到本地邮局

translation.en: So, you send the copy to the main office.
translation.zh: 然后你再寄一份附件到邮政总局

translation.en: If they follow protocol, they'll pick up the phone and say, "Hey, do you have the original?"
translation.zh: 如果你这么做，他们将打电话问：“你是否有原件？”

translation.en: Then some droid in the back puts the name on a tickler and says, "Oh, this is an important letter."
translation.zh: 那样一些工作人员会在信贴上一些标签 写到”哦，这是封重要的信件“

translation.en: And you actually get into the folder that the elected official actually has to read.
translation.zh: 你的信就这样进入了正式的文件夹 然后有关领导必须仔细读这封信了

translation.en: So, what your letter means: I've got to tell you, we are all in a party, and political officials are the pinatas.
translation.zh: 那么你的信意味着什么呢 我必须告诉你，我们都在一个派对中 而政客是彩罐

translation.en: (Laughter) We are harangued, lectured to, sold, marketed, but a letter is actually one of the few times that we have honest communication.
translation.zh: （观众笑声） 我们听他们长篇大论 被买卖，被推销 但是书信是少数几次 可以真诚交流的机会

translation.en: I got this letter when I was first elected, and I still carry it to every council meeting I go to.
translation.zh: 我第一次被选为人大代表是时，我收到了这封信 我一直带着它 参加每一场咨询会

translation.en: This is an opportunity at real dialogue, and if you have stewardship and want to communicate, that dialogue is incredibly powerful.
translation.zh: 这是一次真实对话的机会 而如果你有这个台阶 并想要沟通 那这个对话将非常重要

translation.en: So when you do that, here's what I can promise: You're going to be the 800 pound gorilla in the forest.
translation.zh: 所以一旦你这么去做了，我保证 你将会成为丛林中的大猩猩

translation.en: Get writing.
translation.zh: 拿起笔来。

translation.en: (Applause) Namaste. Salaam.
translation.zh: （观众掌声） 致敬(梵文)。致敬(阿拉伯语)。

translation.en: Shalom. Sat Sri Akal.
translation.zh: 致敬(希伯来语)。 致敬(旁遮普语)。

translation.en: Greetings to all of you from Pakistan.
translation.zh: 巴基斯坦人民向你们致敬。

translation.en: It is often said that we fear that which we do not know.
translation.zh: 人们常说我们害怕未知的东西。

translation.en: And Pakistan, in this particular vein, is very similar.
translation.zh: 巴基斯坦也是这样。

translation.en: Because it has provoked, and does provoke, a visceral anxiety in the bellies of many a Western soul, especially when viewed through the monochromatic lens of turbulence and turmoil.
translation.zh: 不管是过去还是现在， 它都使很多西方人忧心忡忡， 假若仅从 社会动荡的角度去看，就更是如此。

translation.en: But there are many other dimensions to Pakistan.
translation.zh: 但巴基斯坦尚有很多不为人知的地方。

translation.en: And what follows is a stream of images, a series of images captured by some of Pakistan's most dynamic and young photographers, that aims to give you an alternative glimpse, a look inside the hearts and minds of some ordinary Pakistani citizens.
translation.zh: 接下来的照片， 是巴基斯坦人自己拍摄的。 他们都是年轻有为的摄影家。 他们致力于将巴基斯坦的另一面展现于世； 他们致力于展现 普通民众的心灵。

translation.en: Here are some of the stories they wanted us to share with you.
translation.zh: 这些是他们与我们分享的内容。

translation.en: My name is Abdul Khan. I come from Peshawar.
translation.zh: 我叫Abdul Khan来自Peshawar。

translation.en: I hope that you will be able to see not just my Taliban-like beard, but also the richness and color of my perceptions, aspirations and dreams, as rich and colorful as the satchels that I sell.
translation.zh: 我希望你能看到的 不仅仅是我的塔利班式大胡子， 还有我的富足与丰富多彩[的生活]， 以及我的认知、抱负与梦想， 而不只是我卖的各式花色的书包。

translation.en: My name is Meher and this is my friend Irim.
translation.zh: 我叫Meher，这位是我的朋友Irim，

translation.en: I hope to become a vet when I grow up so that I can take care of stray cats and dogs who wander around the streets of the village that I live near Gilgit, northern Pakistan.
translation.zh: 长大后我想当兽医， 这样我就能照顾流浪猫和流浪狗了， 街上、村里可多流浪的狗和猫了。 我住在Gilgit，位于巴基斯坦北部。

translation.en: My name is Kailash. And I like to enrich lives through technicolored glass.
translation.zh: 我叫Kailash，我喜欢丰富多彩的生活 就如透过五光十色的玻璃[看世界]。

translation.en: Madame, would you like some of those orange bangles with the pink polka dots?
translation.zh: 夫人，您想来个橙色的手镯吗 上面有粉色圆点的那种。

translation.en: My name is Zamin.
translation.zh: 我叫Zamin。

translation.en: And I'm an IDP, an internally displaced person, from Swat.
translation.zh: 是个国内流亡的难民， 我来自Swat。

translation.en: Do you see me on the other side of this fence?
translation.zh: 你从篱笆的另一面的看到我了吗？

translation.en: Do I matter, or really exist for you?
translation.zh: 我应存于此世界吗？

translation.en: My name is Iman. I am a fashion model, an up-and-coming model from Lahore.
translation.zh: 我叫Iman，是个模特， 是个来自Lahore的新秀。

translation.en: Do you see me simply smothered in cloth?
translation.zh: 你看到我简约的遮住全身的衣服了吗？

translation.en: Or can you move beyond my veil and see me for who I truly am inside?
translation.zh: 你能看到面纱后的我吗？ 你能看穿我么？

translation.en: My name is Ahmed. I am an Afghan refugee from the Khyber agency.
translation.zh: 我叫Ahmed，是个阿富汗难民， 我来自Khyber。

translation.en: I have come from a place of intense darkness.
translation.zh: 我来自一个充满黑暗的地方。

translation.en: And that is why I want to illuminate the world.
translation.zh: 我想照亮世界。

translation.en: My name is Papusay.
translation.zh: 我叫Papusay。

translation.en: My heart and drum beat as one.
translation.zh: 我的鼓随心振动。

translation.en: If religion is the opium of the masses, then for me, music is my one and only ganja.
translation.zh: 假若宗教是大众的鸦片， 音乐就是我唯一的大麻。

translation.en: A rising tide lifts all boats.
translation.zh: 大浪托起一艘艘船。

translation.en: And the rising tide of India's spectacular economic growth has lifted over 400 million Indians into a buoyant middle class.
translation.zh: 印度的浪花 预示着经济的腾飞。 它将托起4亿 印度人进入殷实的中产阶级。

translation.en: But there are still over 650 million Indians, Pakistanis, Sri Lankans, Bangladeshis, Nepalese, who remain washed up on the shores of poverty.
translation.zh: 但还有6.5亿印度人， 巴基斯坦人、斯里兰卡人、孟加拉人和尼泊尔人 尚挣扎于贫困的谷底。

translation.en: Therefore as India and Pakistan, as you and I, it behooves us to transcend our differences, to celebrate our diversity, to leverage our common humanity.
translation.zh: 作为印巴人，你与我 都应把克服困难， 从而来庆祝我们文化的多样性。 提升我们共同的人性。

translation.en: Our collective vision at Naya Jeevan, which for many of you, as you all recognize, means "new life" in Urdu and Hindi, is to rejuvenate the lives of millions of low income families by providing them with affordable access to catastrophic health care.
translation.zh: 我们共同的Naya Jeevan， 正如在座的很多位都知道， Naya Jeevan在乌尔都语和印度语中是新生活的意思， 让我们重振低收入家庭的生活 向他们提供资源 提供医保。

translation.en: Indeed it is the emerging world's first HMO for the urban working poor.
translation.zh: 的确，这是发展中国家第一个 针对城市低收入人群的健康维护组织。

translation.en: Why should we do this as Indians and Pakistanis?
translation.zh: 为何我们要在行动时划清国界呢？

translation.en: We are but two threads cut from the same cloth.
translation.zh: 我们骨肉相连。

translation.en: And if our fates are intertwined, then we believe that it is good karma, it is good fortune.
translation.zh: 命运息息相关 这是我们的荣幸。

translation.en: And for many of us, our fortunes do indeed lie at the bottom of the pyramid. Thank you.
translation.zh: 对于我们中的许多人来说，财富的确埋藏在 金字塔底。谢谢。

translation.en: (Applause) Chris Anderson: Fantastic. Just stay up here.
translation.zh: （鼓掌） Chris Anderson：太棒了，先别走。

translation.en: That was fantastic.
translation.zh: 棒极了。

translation.en: I found that really moving.
translation.zh: 真的很感人。

translation.en: You know, we fought hard to get at least a small Pakistani contingent to come.
translation.zh: 要知道，为了让巴基斯坦的代表团到场 我们尽了一切努力。

translation.en: It felt like it was really important.
translation.zh: 这真的很重要。

translation.en: They went through a lot to get here.
translation.zh: 他们千辛万苦才来到这儿。

translation.en: Would the Pakistanis please just stand up please?
translation.zh: 请在座的巴基斯坦人站起来。

translation.en: I just really wanted to acknowledge you.
translation.zh: 我想向你们致敬。

translation.en: (Applause) Thank you so much.
translation.zh: （鼓掌） 非常感谢。

translation.en: So, imagine you're standing on a street anywhere in America and a Japanese man comes up to you and says, "Excuse me, what is the name of this block?"
translation.zh: 好，假设你现在站在美国任何一个地方的街道上 一个日本人走过来跟你说， “打扰一下，请问这栋街区叫什么名字？”

translation.en: And you say, "I'm sorry, well, this is Oak Street, that's Elm Street.
translation.zh: 而你说，“不知道。不过，这条是橡树街，那条是榆树街。

translation.en: This is 26th, that's 27th."
translation.zh: 这条是26街，那条是27街。”

translation.en: He says, "OK, but what is the name of that block?"
translation.zh: 他说，“哦，好的。那这栋街区叫什么名字呢？”

translation.en: You say, "Well, blocks don't have names.
translation.zh: 你说，“街区是没有名字的。

translation.en: Streets have names; blocks are just the unnamed spaces in between streets."
translation.zh: 街道才有名字；街区只不过是 街道之间的未命名的空间。”

translation.en: He leaves, a little confused and disappointed.
translation.zh: 他带着一点疑惑和失望离开了。

translation.en: So, now imagine you're standing on a street, anywhere in Japan, you turn to a person next to you and say, "Excuse me, what is the name of this street?"
translation.zh: 好，现在假设你正站在日本某个地方的街道上， 你找到你旁边的一个人说， “打扰一下，请问这条街道叫什么名字？”

translation.en: They say, "Oh, well that's Block 17 and this is Block 16."
translation.zh: 他们说，“哦，那栋是17街区，这栋是16街区。”

translation.en: And you say, "OK, but what is the name of this street?"
translation.zh: 你说，“好的，那这条街道叫什么呢？”

translation.en: And they say, "Well, streets don't have names.
translation.zh: 他们会说，“啊，街道是没有名字的。

translation.en: Blocks have names.
translation.zh: 街区才有名字。

translation.en: Just look at Google Maps here. There's Block 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19.
translation.zh: 看一下这张谷歌地图，这里有14，15，16，17，18，19街区。

translation.en: All of these blocks have names, and the streets are just the unnamed spaces in between the blocks.
translation.zh: 这些街区都有名字。 街道只不过是街区之间那些未命名的空间。

translation.en: And you say then, "OK, then how do you know your home address?"
translation.zh: 那你会说了，“好吧，那你怎么写你的家庭住址呢？”

translation.en: He said, "Well, easy, this is District Eight.
translation.zh: 他说，“嗨，简单，这里是第八区，

translation.en: There's Block 17, house number one."
translation.zh: 17街区，一号房屋。”

translation.en: You say, "OK, but walking around the neighborhood, I noticed that the house numbers don't go in order."
translation.zh: 你说，“好吧，但是在邻里四周转转， 我发现房屋号码不是按顺序排的。”

translation.en: He says, "Of course they do. They go in the order in which they were built.
translation.zh: 他说，“当然不是。他们是按他们建造的时间顺序来排序的。

translation.en: The first house ever built on a block is house number one.
translation.zh: 街区里第一所建造的房子是一号房屋。

translation.en: The second house ever built is house number two.
translation.zh: 第二所建造的房子是二号房屋。

translation.en: Third is house number three. It's easy. It's obvious."
translation.zh: 第三所是三号房屋。很简单，很明显。”

translation.en: So, I love that sometimes we need to go to the opposite side of the world to realize assumptions we didn't even know we had, and realize that the opposite of them may also be true.
translation.zh: 所以，我认为有时候我们需要 去世界的另一端 去验证那些我们不以为意的偏见， 去验证我们偏见的反面可能也是正确的。

translation.en: So, for example, there are doctors in China who believe that it's their job to keep you healthy.
translation.zh: 例如，中国的医生 认为保持你的健康是他们的职责。

translation.en: So, any month you are healthy you pay them, and when you're sick you don't have to pay them because they failed at their job. They get rich when you're healthy, not sick.
translation.zh: 所以，你健康的时候你得付钱给他们， 而当你生病的时候你不需要付钱给他们，因为他们 在他们的工作上失职了。他们在你健康而不是生病的时候赚钱。

translation.en: (Applause) In most music, we think of the "one" as the downbeat, the beginning of the musical phrase: one, two, three, four.
translation.zh: （掌声） 在大多数音乐中我们认为第一拍 是强拍，是音阶的开始。一，二，三，四。

translation.en: But in West African music, the "one" is thought of as the end of the phrase, like the period at the end of a sentence.
translation.zh: 但在非洲西部音乐中，第一拍 被认为是音阶的结束， 就像是句子末尾的句号。

translation.en: So, you can hear it not just in the phrasing, but the way they count off their music: two, three, four, one.
translation.zh: 因此，你不但可以在音阶中，而且可以从他们打节奏的方法上听到。 二，三，四，一。

translation.en: And this map is also accurate.
translation.zh: 而这张地图也是正确的。

translation.en: (Laughter) There's a saying that whatever true thing you can say about India, the opposite is also true.
translation.zh: （笑声） 有个谚语说，无论你说什么关于印度的真理， 反过来它也是正确的。

translation.en: So, let's never forget, whether at TED, or anywhere else, that whatever brilliant ideas you have or hear, that the opposite may also be true.
translation.zh: 所以，我们永远不要忘记，无论在TED，或其他任何地方， 无论你有了或听到了什么精妙的思想， 那反面可能也是正确的。

translation.en: Domo arigato gozaimashita.
translation.zh: 谢谢。（日语）

translation.en: I have a daughter, Mulan.
translation.zh: 我的女儿叫木兰。

translation.en: And when she was eight, last year, she was doing a report for school or she had some homework about frogs.
translation.zh: 去年她刚好八岁， 学校要她做个报告， 要么就是她得做些和青蛙有关的家庭作业。

translation.en: And we were at this restaurant, and she said, "So, basically, frogs lay eggs and the eggs turn into tadpoles, and tadpoles turn into frogs."
translation.zh: 当时我们在餐馆， 她说，”那么，基本上， 青蛙产卵， 卵变成蝌蚪， 然后蝌蚪变成青蛙。”

translation.en: And I said, "Yeah. You know, I'm not really up on my frog reproduction that much.
translation.zh: 我回答，“大概吧，我对青蛙繁殖不是很熟悉，

translation.en: It's the females, I think, that lay the eggs, and then the males fertilize them.
translation.zh: 我想，应该是雌青蛙产卵， 雄青蛙使他们受精，

translation.en: And then they become tadpoles and frogs."
translation.zh: 然后就变成了蝌蚪和青蛙。”

translation.en: And she says, "What? Only the females have eggs?"
translation.zh: 女儿说，”什么？只有雌青蛙产卵？“

translation.en: And I said, "Yeah."
translation.zh: 我说，”是的。“

translation.en: And she goes, "And what's this fertilizing?"
translation.zh: 她问，”那么什么是受精？“

translation.en: So I kind of said, "Oh, it's this extra ingredient, you know, that you need to create a new frog from the mom and dad frog." (Laughter) And she said, "Oh, so is that true for humans too?"
translation.zh: 我就回答，”噢，是额外的一种成分... 你知道，需要这种额外的成分 来使得青蛙爸爸和青蛙妈妈 得到一只青蛙宝宝。” 她又问，“哦，人类也是这样吗？”

translation.en: And I thought, "Okay, here we go."
translation.zh: 我心想，“这下好了，该来的还是要来。”

translation.en: I didn't know it would happen so quick, at eight.
translation.zh: 我没有想到这事来得这么快，她才八岁。

translation.en: I was trying to remember all the guidebooks, and all I could remember was, "Only answer the question they're asking.
translation.zh: 我努力回想所有给家长的指导丛书， 唯一能想起就是， “只回答孩子们问的问题，

translation.en: Don't give any more information." (Laughter) So I said, "Yes."
translation.zh: 不要提供任何额外的信息。“ 于是我说，”是。“

translation.en: And she said, "And where do, um, where do human women, like, where do women lay their eggs?"
translation.zh: 她又问：“ 在哪里， 人类妇女 在哪里产卵呢？

translation.en: And I said, "Well, funny you should ask. (Laughter) We have evolved to have our own pond.
translation.zh: 我回答，“嗯， 好问题， 我们已经进化到了有自己的池塘，

translation.en: We have our very own pond inside our bodies.
translation.zh: 我们的身体里有属于自己的池塘。

translation.en: And we lay our eggs there, we don't have to worry about other eggs or anything like that.
translation.zh: 就在体内的池塘里产卵。 我们也不用担心会和别人的卵搞混，

translation.en: It's our own pond. And that's how it happens."
translation.zh: 因为那是我们自己的池子。就是这么回事。“

translation.en: And she goes, "Then how do they get fertilized?"
translation.zh: 她又问，”那么这些卵怎么受精呢？“

translation.en: And I said, "Well, Men, through their penis, they fertilize the eggs by the sperm coming out.
translation.zh: 我回答，”嗯， 通过男人的阴茎， 他们的精子使卵子受精。

translation.en: And you go through the woman's vagina."
translation.zh: 这要经过女人的阴道。“

translation.en: And so we're just eating, and her jaw just drops, and she goes, "Mom!
translation.zh: 当时我们正在吃饭，她惊讶得把嘴张得老大，下巴恨不得掉下来， 喊道，”妈妈！

translation.en: Like, where you go to the bathroom?"
translation.zh: 就是我们上厕所时用的的地方？”

translation.en: And I said, "I know.
translation.zh: 我说，“可不是～～

translation.en: I know."
translation.zh: 可不是～～

translation.en: (Laughter) That's how we evolved. It does seem odd.
translation.zh: （笑声） 但这就是我们的进化，是有点奇怪，

translation.en: It is a little bit like having a waste treatment plant right next to an amusement park ...
translation.zh: 就好像把一个废弃物处理站 建得紧靠游乐场一样，

translation.en: Bad zoning, but ..." (Laughter) She's like, "What?" And she goes, "But Mom, but men and women can't ever see each other naked, Mom.
translation.zh: 规划不当。但是…… 她又惊呼“什么？但是妈妈 男人和女人不能看见彼此光着身子的样子啊妈妈。

translation.en: So how could that ever happen?"
translation.zh: 那么这怎么可能发生呢？”

translation.en: And then I go, "Well," and then I put my Margaret Mead hat on.
translation.zh: 这时我摆出一副人类学家的模样开始步道：

translation.en: "Human males and females develop a special bond, and when they're much older, much, much older than you, and they have a very special feeling, then they can be naked together."
translation.zh: "男人和女人呢， 会发展出一种特别的关系， 当他们长大时，比你可要大得多的多， 他们之间会产生一种特别的情感， 到那时他们就可以赤裸相见。“

translation.en: And she said, "Mom, have you done this before?"
translation.zh: 她问，“妈妈， 你以前也做过那些？”

translation.en: And I said, "Yes."
translation.zh: 我回答，“是的。”

translation.en: And she said, "But Mom, you can't have kids."
translation.zh: 她又说，“但是妈妈，你不能生小孩啊。”

translation.en: Because she knows that I adopted her and that I can't have kids.
translation.zh: 因为她知道她是我领养的小孩因为我不能生育。

translation.en: And I said, "Yes."
translation.zh: 我回答，“是的。”

translation.en: And she said, "Well, you don't have to do that again."
translation.zh: 她松了口气，“谢天谢地你不用再做那些了。”

translation.en: And I said, "..."
translation.zh: 我无语。

translation.en: And then she said, "But how does it happen when a man and woman are together?
translation.zh: 过了一会儿她又问了，“但是当一个男人和一个女人在一起时那些事情会怎样发生呢？

translation.en: Like, how do they know that's the time?
translation.zh: 就好比，他们怎么知道是时候了呢？

translation.en: Mom, does the man just say, 'Is now the time to take off my pants?'" (Laughter) And I said, "Yes."
translation.zh: 妈妈，难道男人就直接问， 现在是时候脱裤子了吗?" (大笑) 我说，“没错。

translation.en: (Laughter) "That is exactly right.
translation.zh: （狂笑） 完全正确

translation.en: That's exactly how it happens."
translation.zh: 就是这么说的。”

translation.en: So we're driving home and she's looking out the window, and she goes, "Mom. What if two just people saw each other on the street, like a man and a woman, they just started doing it. Would that ever happen?"
translation.zh: 后来我们开车回家，她看着窗外，问道， “妈妈，如果两个人在街上遇到， 一个男的一个女的，然后他们就突然开始做那事了，会不会这样啊？”

translation.en: And I said, "Oh, no. Humans are so private.
translation.zh: 我说，“噢，不，人类是很注重隐私的。
哦，不会的。“

translation.en: And then she goes, "What if there was like a party, and there was just like a whole bunch of girls and a whole bunch of boys, and there was a bunch of men and women and they just started doing it, Mom?
translation.zh: 她又说，”如果有个聚会， 有一群男人和一群女人。 然后他们就突然开始做那事了。妈妈，

translation.en: Would that ever happen?"
translation.zh: 这会不会发生啊？“

translation.en: And I said, "Oh, no, no.
translation.zh: 我回答，”噢，不，不，

translation.en: That's not how we do it."
translation.zh: 我们不会这样做的。”

translation.en: Then we got home and we see the cat. And she goes, "Mom, how do cats do it?"
translation.zh: 随后我们到家，看见只猫，她又问道， “妈妈，猫咪们是怎么做的呢？”

translation.en: And I go, "Oh, it's the same. It's basically the same."
translation.zh: 我回答，“是一样的，基本上一样。”

translation.en: And then she got all caught up in the legs. "But how would the legs go, Mom?
translation.zh: 她立刻纠缠在腿的问题上，“但是，腿要怎么放呢？妈妈

translation.en: I don't understand the legs."
translation.zh: 我不知道腿要怎么办。“

translation.en: She goes, "Mom, everyone can't do the splits."
translation.zh: 她说，”妈妈，又不是每个人都会劈叉。“

translation.en: And I go, "I know, but the legs ..."
translation.zh: 我说，”我知道，但这腿……”

translation.en: and I'm probably like, "The legs get worked out."
translation.zh: 腿的问题自己会解决啦。”

translation.en: And she goes, "But I just can't understand it."
translation.zh: 她纠缠不放，“但是我想不通。”

translation.en: So I go, "You know, why don't we go on the Internet, and maybe we can see ... like on Wikipedia." (Laughter) So we go online, and we put in "cats mating."
translation.zh: 没办法，我只好说，“要不我们上网吧， 也许可以看到。”我当时猜测维基百科之类。 于是我们上网，搜索猫的交配。

translation.en: And, unfortunately, on YouTube, there's many cats mating videos.
translation.zh: 不幸的是，在YouTube上，有无数猫的交配视频。

translation.en: And we watched them and I'm so thankful, because she's just like, "Wow! This is so amazing."
translation.zh: 我们看了，非常谢天谢地的， 她只是一直感叹，“哇，多么神奇啊！”

translation.en: She goes, "What about dogs?"
translation.zh: 她又继续，“那么狗狗呢？”

translation.en: So we put in dogs mating, and, you know, we're watching it, and she's totally absorbed.
translation.zh: 我们接着搜索狗的交配， 你知道，又看了那些视频，她完全沉浸其中。

translation.en: And then she goes, "Mom, do you think they would have, on the Internet, any humans mating?"
translation.zh: 她再次发问，“妈妈， 你说网上会不会有 人交配的视频啊？”

translation.en: (Laughter) And then I realized that I had taken my little eight year old's hand, and taken her right into Internet porn. (Laughter) And I looked into this trusting, loving face, and I said, "Oh, no.
translation.zh: （大笑） 这时我才意识到， 我牵着八岁女儿的手， 一直把她带进了网络色情片的殿堂。 我看着她 她那天真充满信任的脸， 我说， “哦，不，

translation.en: That would never happen."
translation.zh: 绝对没有。”

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家。

translation.en: (Applause) Thank you.
translation.zh: （掌声） 谢谢。

translation.en: (Applause) Thank you. I'm so happy to be here.
translation.zh: （掌声不断） 谢谢，很高兴来这里。

translation.en: Last year here at TED I asked you to give me your data, to put your data on the web, on the basis that if people put data onto the web -- government data, scientific data, community data, whatever it is -- it will be used by other people to do wonderful things, in ways that they never could have imagined.
translation.zh: 去年，在TED， 我请求你们公开你们的数据资料， 把数据资料放到网上，因为 如果人们把他们的数据资料放到网上， 那么政府数据，科学数据， 社区数据， 不管是什么， 就会被其他人用来 做一些美好的事情，这是 他们从来都无法想象的事情。

translation.en: So, today I'm back just to show you a few things, to show you, in fact, there is an open data movement afoot, now, around the world.
translation.zh: 所以， 今天我回来向你们展示几个事例， 事实上， 现在在世界各地，公开数据资料的运动正在兴起 。

translation.en: The cry of "Raw data now!"
translation.zh: 在去年TED演讲中，我和大家一起大声呼吁的“实时的原始数据”

translation.en: which I made people make in the auditorium, was heard around the world.
translation.zh: 已经 传播到世界各地。

translation.en: So, let's roll the video.
translation.zh: 所以， 让我们播放录像。

translation.en: A classic story, the first one which lots of people picked up, was when in March -- on March 10th in fact, soon after TED -- Paul Clarke, in the U.K. government, blogged, "Oh, I've just got some raw data. Here it is, it's about bicycle accidents."
translation.zh: 事实上TED刚刚结束不久，3月10日播了这经典故事视频，它也是很多人首选 的故事。 英国政府的保罗克拉克Paul Clarke 发博客：“ 噢，我刚刚得到了一些原始数据。这个就是 有关自行车意外的数据。”

translation.en: Two days it took the Times Online to make a map, a mashable map -- we call these things mash-ups -- a mashed-up user interface that allows you to go in there and have a look and find out whether your bicycle route to work was affected.
translation.zh: 时代在线用了两天时间 做了一个地图， 一个合成的地图， 我们称之为：合成(把数据融合到地图上)， 经过这种合成，你可以通过用户界面 搜索和找到你上班的自行车 路线是否受影响。

translation.en: Here's more data, traffic survey data, again, put out by the U.K. government, and because they put it up using the Linked Data standards, then a user could just make a map, just by clicking.
translation.zh: 除此， 网上还很多其他的数据， 交通调查数据等 都是英国政府放上去的。 因为他们上传的数据符合链接标准， 所以用户可以使用这些数据做地图， 只要点击一下就做成了。

translation.en: Does this data affect things? Well, let's get back to 2008.
translation.zh: 这些数据起作用吗？ 好吧，让我们回到2008年。

translation.en: Look at Zanesville, Ohio.
translation.zh: 看看俄亥俄州曾斯维尔,

translation.en: Here's a map a lawyer made. He put on it the water plant, and which houses are there, which houses have been connected to the water.
translation.zh: 这是一张律师制作的在自来水厂地图， 看到那些房子， 谁家连着用水？

translation.en: And he got, from other data sources, information to show which houses are occupied by white people.
translation.zh: 然后从其他数据源，他得到 资料显示了 哪个房子是白人家庭的。

translation.en: Well, there was too much of a correlation, he felt, between which houses were occupied by white people and which houses had water, and the judge was not impressed either.
translation.zh: 他感到，这两者之间的关联太紧密了。 就哪些是白人拥有的房子， 和哪些房子有自来水之间的关系，法官看到以后对此也很不满。

translation.en: The judge was not impressed to the tune of 10.9 million dollars.
translation.zh: 法官因此罚了他们1090万美元。

translation.en: That's the power of taking one piece of data, another piece of data, putting it together, and showing the result.
translation.zh: 这就是拿了一组数据 和另一组数据放在一起的力量， 结果是显而易见的。

translation.en: Let's look at some data from the U.K. now.
translation.zh: 现在让我们看看英国的一些数据。

translation.en: This is U.K. government data, a completely independent site, Where Does My Money Go.
translation.zh: 这是英国政府的数据， 完全独立的网站， 我的钱花到哪里去了，

translation.en: It allows anybody to go there and burrow down.
translation.zh: 这个网站让任何人在网站上利用其数据。

translation.en: You can burrow down by a particular type of spending, or you can go through all the different regions and compare them.
translation.zh: 你可以根据特别的消费种类来查找 也可以找出不同的地区的数据来做比较。

translation.en: So, that's happening in the U.K. with U.K. government data.
translation.zh: 英国人正在用英国政府提供的数据资料做这些事情。

translation.en: Yes, certainly you can do it over here.
translation.zh: 是的， 在这里你也可以做。

translation.en: Here's a site which allows you to look at recovery spending in California.
translation.zh: 在加利福尼亚，这个网站让你查找复苏经费的使用情况 。

translation.en: Take an arbitrary example, Long Beach, California, you can go and have a look at what recovery money they've been spending on different things such as energy.
translation.zh: 随便举例，加利福尼亚长滩， 你可以看见人们使用政府发放的复苏经费都花 在不同事情的支出，例如在能源上支出。

translation.en: In fact, this is the graph of the number of data sets in the repositories of data.gov, and data.gov.uk.
translation.zh: 事实上， 这是几组数据的图表， 他们存放在data.gov上， 和data.gov.uk网上。

translation.en: And I'm delighted to see a great competition between the U.K. in blue, and the U.S. in red.
translation.zh: 我真高兴看见这种积极的竞争， 英国显示的是蓝色， 美国是红色。

translation.en: How can you use this stuff?
translation.zh: 你怎么用这些东西呢？

translation.en: Well, for example, if you have lots of data about places you can take, from a postcode -- which is like a zip plus four -- for a specific group of houses, you can make paper, print off a paper which has got very, very specific things about the bus stops, the things specifically near you.
translation.zh: 举个例子吧， 你有一个地区的大量数据， 你可以从一个邮政编码， 就是美国邮政编码ZIP + 4， 特定群体的住房，你可以用图像合成， 打印的图像会有特别具体 的信息， 比如公交车站， 包括那些离你很近的事情。

translation.en: On a larger scale, this is a mash-up of the data which was released about the Afghan elections.
translation.zh: 从大处方面说， 这是一个 阿富汗选举数据与地图的合成。

translation.en: It allows you to set your own criteria for what sort of things you want to look at.
translation.zh: 为了你想看到的东西， 它允许你设置你自己的标准。

translation.en: The red circles are polling stations, selected by your criteria.
translation.zh: 这些红圈是投票点， 是根据你的标准选择的。

translation.en: And then you can select also other things on the map to see what other factors, like the threat level.
translation.zh: 你也可以选择地图上的其他内容， 你可以看见其他数据，比如威胁程度。

translation.en: So, that was government data.
translation.zh: 所以，这也是政府的数据。

translation.en: I also talked about community-generated data -- in fact I edited some.
translation.zh: 我也谈过社区制作的， 事实上我也参与此，

translation.en: This is the wiki map, this is the Open Street Map.
translation.zh: 这是wiki地图， 这是公开的街道地图。

translation.en: "Terrace Theater" I actually put on the map because it wasn't on the map before TED last year.
translation.zh: 我把梯形剧场放到 地图上去的， 因为去年TED召开的时候地图上还没有它。

translation.en: I was not the only person editing the open street map.
translation.zh: 我不是唯一编辑公开地图的人。

translation.en: Each flash on this visualization -- put together by ITO World -- shows an edit in 2009 made to the Open Street Map.
translation.zh: 在ITO World（itoworld.com）可视化地图里，每个亮点 都是 大家在2009年编辑的， 这形成了公开街道地图。

translation.en: Let's now spin the world during the same year.
translation.zh: 让我们绕着整个世界看一下这一年所发生的。

translation.en: Every flash is an edit. Somebody somewhere looking at the Open Street Map, and realizing it could be better.
translation.zh: 每个亮点都是一次编辑的记录。 有人在某些地方 看着公开街道地图， 发现它可以改进得更好。

translation.en: You can see Europe is ablaze with updates.
translation.zh: 你看见欧洲的更新非常频繁。

translation.en: Some places, perhaps not as much as they should be.
translation.zh: 有些地方反而更新程度没有跟上。

translation.en: Here focusing in on Haiti.
translation.zh: 这里聚焦的是海地。

translation.en: The map of Port au-Prince at the end of 2009 was not all it could be, not as good as the map of California.
translation.zh: 太子港地图在2009年底 还没怎么编辑， 不如加利福尼亚的地图编辑得好。

translation.en: Fortunately, just after the earthquake, GeoEye, a commercial company, released satellite imagery with a license, which allowed the open-source community to use it.
translation.zh: 幸运的是， 地震发生后不久， GeoEye， 一个商业公司 发布了卫星图象 并有一个许可证允许 公开网络社区使用这些图象。

translation.en: This is January, in time lapse, of people editing ... that's the earthquake.
translation.zh: 随着1月份时间的推移， 人们参与了编辑， 然后地震发生了。

translation.en: After the earthquake, immediately, people all over the world, mappers who wanted to help, and could, looked at that imagery, built the map, quickly building it up.
translation.zh: 地震发生后不久， 全世界的人们， 地图制作者们 都想要提供帮助，可以 看着这些图象， 迅速地建立地图。

translation.en: We're focusing now on Port-au-Prince.
translation.zh: 我们现在看到的是太子港。

translation.en: The light blue is refugee camps these volunteers had spotted from the [satellite images].
translation.zh: 蓝色的是那些自愿者从空中发现的难民营。

translation.en: So, now we have, immediately, a real-time map showing where there are refugee camps -- rapidly became the best map to use if you're doing relief work in Port-au-Prince.
translation.zh: 所以，现在我们立即有实时公开地图 显示难民营在什么地方， 如果你在太子港从事援助工作 那这就是最好的地图。

translation.en: Witness the fact that it's here on this Garmin device being used by rescue team in Haiti.
translation.zh: 事实证明，这地图也支持救援队使用高明卫星地图 定位。

translation.en: There's the map showing, on the left-hand side, that hospital -- actually that's a hospital ship.
translation.zh: 海地， 左边的这张地图显示 一个 医院，事实上是一个建在船上的医院。

translation.en: This is a real-time map that shows blocked roads, damaged buildings, refugee camps -- it shows things that are needed [for rescue and relief work].
translation.zh: 这实时的地图显示阻塞的道路， 背毁的建筑， 难民营， 它表明哪里需要东西。

translation.en: So, if you've been involved in that at all, I just wanted to say: Whatever you've been doing, whether you've just been chanting, "Raw data now!"
translation.zh: 所以， 如果你已经参与了公开数据， 我只想说，不管你已经做了什么， 你是否刚开始原始数据图表编辑，

translation.en: or you've been putting government or scientific data online, I just wanted to take this opportunity to say: Thank you very much, and we have only just started!
translation.zh: 还是将政府或者科学研究的数据放到网上， 我只想借此机会说声非常感谢， 而我们才刚刚开始。

translation.en: (Applause) Please close your eyes, and open your hands.
translation.zh: （谢谢） 请闭上眼睛 打开双手

translation.en: Now imagine what you could place in your hands: an apple, maybe your wallet.
translation.zh: 想象下,你们的手中可以放些什么? 一只苹果?或者钱包?

translation.en: Now open your eyes.
translation.zh: 请睁开眼睛.

translation.en: What about a life?
translation.zh: 你曾否想过一个生命?

translation.en: What you see here is a premature baby.
translation.zh: 这是一个早产儿。

translation.en: He looks like he's resting peacefully, but in fact he's struggling to stay alive because he can't regulate his own body temperature.
translation.zh: 看起来，他似乎在安睡，但实际上，他正与死神作斗争。 因为他无法调节自己的体温。

translation.en: This baby is so tiny he doesn't have enough fat on his body to stay warm.
translation.zh: 这个婴儿实在太小了， 他没有足够的脂肪来维持体温。

translation.en: Sadly, 20 million babies like this are born every year around the world.
translation.zh: 很悲哀...每年都有两千万这样的婴儿 诞生在世界上。

translation.en: Four million of these babies die annually.
translation.zh: 其中的四百万无法存活。

translation.en: But the bigger problem is that the ones who do survive grow up with severe, long-term health problems.
translation.zh: 但更严重的问题是，如果他们侥幸存活 一些慢性病将伴随他们一生。

translation.en: The reason is because in the first month of a baby's life, its only job is to grow.
translation.zh: 因为在婴儿诞生的第一个月 他们唯一要做的就是成长。

translation.en: If it's battling hypothermia, its organs can't develop normally, resulting in a range of health problems from diabetes, to heart disease, to low I.Q.
translation.zh: 如果体温不稳定，器官不能正常发育 随之而来的，就是一连串健康问题 如糖尿病，心脏病， 或弱智。

translation.en: Imagine: Many of these problems could be prevented if these babies were just kept warm.
translation.zh: 想象下，这些问题本可避免 只要能让婴儿保暖。

translation.en: That is the primary function of an incubator.
translation.zh: 给婴儿保暖是恒温箱的主要功能。

translation.en: But traditional incubators require electricity and cost up to 20 thousand dollars.
translation.zh: 但传统的恒温箱需要电源 且售价高达2万美元。

translation.en: So, you're not going to find them in rural areas of developing countries.
translation.zh: 在发展中国家的偏远地区，恒温箱根本不存在。

translation.en: As a result, parents resort to local solutions like tying hot water bottles around their babies' bodies, or placing them under light bulbs like the ones you see here -- methods that are both ineffective and unsafe.
translation.zh: 因此，父母们只能就地取材， 如在早产儿身体周围绑上热水壶 或如你们所看的这张图，将早产儿放在灯泡下-- 这些方法效果差，且不安全。

translation.en: I've seen this firsthand over and over again.
translation.zh: 我多次亲眼目睹这些惨剧。

translation.en: On one of my first trips to India, I met this young woman, Sevitha, who had just given birth to a tiny premature baby, Rani.
translation.zh: 头几次去印度时，我遇到了这样一位年轻的女性，Sevitha， 她刚刚诞下了一个瘦小的早产儿，Rani。

translation.en: She took her baby to the nearest village clinic, and the doctor advised her to take Rani to a city hospital so she could be placed in an incubator.
translation.zh: 她带着孩子去了村子里最近的诊所， 医生建议她带Rani去市区的医院 把Rani放在恒温箱里。

translation.en: But that hospital was over four hours away, and Sevitha didn't have the means to get there, so her baby died.
translation.zh: 但去医院要花四个多小时。 Sevitha没办法去， 于是，她的宝贝走了。

translation.en: Inspired by this story, and dozens of other similar stories like this, my team and I realized what was needed was a local solution, something that could work without electricity, that was simple enough for a mother or a midwife to use, given that the majority of births still take place in the home.
translation.zh: 由这个故事，及其他类似的故事中受到启发， 我和我的团队意识到，必须要有一个能够就地取材的办法， 一个可不插电的工具， 简单易用，不会难倒母亲和产婆， 因为大多数的婴儿仍然是在家中被接生的。

translation.en: We needed something that was portable, something that could be sterilized and reused across multiple babies and something ultra-low-cost, compared to the 20,000 dollars that an incubator in the U.S. costs.
translation.zh: 这个工具需方便携带， 能够被消毒，并给不同的婴儿重复使用， 价格得极其便宜， 远低于两万美元， 这就是我们要设计的恒温箱。

translation.en: So, this is what we came up with.
translation.zh: 这就是我们的成果。

translation.en: What you see here looks nothing like an incubator.
translation.zh: 它看起来一点也不像个恒温箱。

translation.en: It looks like a small sleeping bag for a baby.
translation.zh: 反似婴儿用的睡袋。

translation.en: You can open it up completely. It's waterproof.
translation.zh: 你可以把它完全打开。它是防水的。

translation.en: There's no seams inside so you can sterilize it very easily.
translation.zh: 无缝设计，便于消毒。

translation.en: But the magic is in this pouch of wax.
translation.zh: 但神奇的地方就在这一包蜡里。

translation.en: This is a phase-change material.
translation.zh: 这是一种渐变性材料。

translation.en: It's a wax-like substance with a melting point of human body temperature, 37 degrees Celsius.
translation.zh: 形似蜡，融点为人体体温 37摄氏度。

translation.en: You can melt this simply using hot water and then when it melts it's able to maintain one constant temperature for four to six hours at a time, after which you simply reheat the pouch.
translation.zh: 用热水就可以把它融化 当它融化时，它将保持恒定的温度 每次维持4到6小时， 之后，你可以对包囊再加热。

translation.en: So, you then place it into this little pocket back here, and it creates a warm micro-environment for the baby.
translation.zh: 将它放在背后的小口袋里， 它会为婴儿营造 一个温暖的小环境。

translation.en: Looks simple, but we've reiterated this dozens of times by going into the field to talk to doctors, moms and clinicians to ensure that this really meets the needs of the local communities.
translation.zh: 看似简单，但我们为此多次 造访当地的医生，母亲，诊所 以确保它能满足当地的要求。

translation.en: We plan to launch this product in India in 2010, and the target price point will be 25 dollars, less than 0.1 percent of the cost of a traditional incubator.
translation.zh: 我们计划于2010年在印度投放该产品。 目标价格定为每只25美元， 不到传统恒温箱 价格的0.1%。

translation.en: Over the next five years we hope to save the lives of almost a million babies.
translation.zh: 在接下来的五年， 我们希望能够救助一百万名婴儿。

translation.en: But the longer-term social impact is a reduction in population growth.
translation.zh: 但它长期的社会影响是降低人口增长。

translation.en: This seems counterintuitive, but turns out that as infant mortality is reduced, population sizes also decrease, because parents don't need to anticipate that their babies are going to die.
translation.zh: 听起来似乎有违常理， 但只要婴儿的死亡率降低， 人口也将减少， 因为父母们不用担心孩子会过早夭折 而生更多的孩子。

translation.en: We hope that the Embrace infant warmer and other simple innovations like this represent a new trend for the future of technology: simple, localized, affordable solutions that have the potential to make huge social impact.
translation.zh: 我们希望这款"温暖的拥抱" 以及其他类似的小创新 能代表未来科技的趋势： 简约化，本土化，经济化， 这将对社会产生巨大影响力。

translation.en: In designing this we followed a few basic principles.
translation.zh: 在设计中，我们遵循了一些基本的法则。

translation.en: We really tried to understand the end user, in this case, people like Sevitha.
translation.zh: 我们急用户之所急，想用户之所想， 了解Sevitha他们的需求。

translation.en: We tried to understand the root of the problem rather than being biased by what already exists.
translation.zh: 我们努力挖掘问题的根源 不受表面现象的影响。

translation.en: And then we thought of the most simple solution we could to address this problem.
translation.zh: 我们希望寻找最简单的方法 来解决问题。

translation.en: In doing this, I believe we can truly bring technology to the masses.
translation.zh: 这样一来，我相信科技必将造福于大众。

translation.en: And we can save millions of lives through the simple warmth of an Embrace.
translation.zh: 通过简单的"温暖的拥抱"，我们可以拯救许多生命。

translation.en: So, basically we have public leaders, public officials who are out of control; they are writing bills that are unintelligible, and out of these bills are going to come maybe 40,000 pages of regulations, total complexity, which has a dramatically negative impact on our life.
translation.zh: 所以，总的来说我们有些领导人、 政府官员办事出格。 他们写的是无法解读的议案。 从这些议案将会产生出 约40,000页的条文，非常复杂， 其对我们的生活将产生极为不利的影响。

translation.en: If you're a veteran coming back from Iraq or Vietnam you face a blizzard of paperwork to get your benefits; if you're trying to get a small business loan, you face a blizzard of paperwork.
translation.zh: 如果你是从伊拉克或是越南战场回来的老兵， 想得到你的救济金，你得做一大堆棘手的文书工作， 如果你想获得一小笔商业贷款， 你也会面临一大堆棘手的文书工作。

translation.en: What are we going to do about it? I define simplicity as a means to achieving clarity, transparency and empathy, building humanity into communications.
translation.zh: 对此，我们应该如何去做？我将简单化定义为 一种能达到清晰、 透明和共鸣， 使交流人性化的一种方法。

translation.en: I've been simplifying things for 30 years.
translation.zh: 30年来我一直致力于事物的简化。

translation.en: I come out of the advertising and design business.
translation.zh: 我是做广告和设计的。

translation.en: My focus is understanding you people, and how you interact with the government to get your benefits, how you interact with corporations to decide whom you're going to do business with, and how you view brands.
translation.zh: 我的关注点是了解大众， 了解你们如何与政府打交道， 去得到你们应得的利益， 了解你们如何与公司打交道而决定你们要与谁去做生意， 以及了解你们如何看待品牌。

translation.en: So, very quickly, when President Obama said, "I don't see why we can't have a one-page, plain English consumer credit agreement."
translation.zh: 所以，当奥巴马总统说 “我不明白为什么我们不能有 一份一页的简单英语消费信贷协议”时

translation.en: So, I locked myself in a room, figured out the content, organized the document, and wrote it in plain English.
translation.zh: 我把自己关在一个房间里 很快想出了这样一个内容， 制定了这样一个文件，并且是用简单英语写的。

translation.en: I've had this checked by the two top consumer credit lawyers in the country.
translation.zh: 我让国内两个顶级 消费信贷律师对其进行了审核。

translation.en: This is a real thing.
translation.zh: 这是件真事。

translation.en: Now, I went one step further and said, "Why do we have to stick with the stodgy lawyers and just have a paper document? Let's go online."
translation.zh: 现在我又进了一步， “为什么我们只能有一份纸质文件 并且非要依附于那些墨守成规的律师呢？让我们上网去解决“。

translation.en: And many people might need help in computation.
translation.zh: 许多人 可能在计算上需要帮助。

translation.en: Working with the Harvard Business School, you'll see this example when you talk about minimum payment: If you spent 62 dollars for a meal, the longer you take to pay out that loan, you see, over a period of time using the minimum payment it's 99 dollars and 17 cents.
translation.zh: 与哈佛商学院合作时， 我们有一个关于最低还款额的案例。 你一顿饭花了62美元， 如果你采用最低还款额延期还款的作法， 过了一段时间， 则需还款99美元17美分。

translation.en: How about that? Do you think your bank is going to show that to people?
translation.zh: 你觉得怎么样？你认为银行会向人们告知吗？

translation.en: But it's going to work. It's more effective than just computational aids.
translation.zh: 但它就是这样运作的。它比仅仅计算 货款时间更有效。

translation.en: And what about terms like "over the limit"?
translation.zh: 你如何理解有些词汇 例如超过限度？

translation.en: Perhaps a stealth thing.
translation.zh: 也许这是一件隐匿的事情。

translation.en: Define it in context. Tell people what it means.
translation.zh: 通过上下文来定义它，告诉人们它是什么意思。

translation.en: When you put it in plain English, you almost force the institution to give the people a way, a default out of that, and not put themselves at risk.
translation.zh: 在你使用简单英语表述时， 你实际上就迫使这家机构 使人们了解如何去规避风险， 而不是把自己置于风险之中。

translation.en: Plain English is about changing the content.
translation.zh: 简单英语也就是 改变内容。

translation.en: And one of the things I'm most proud of is this agreement for IBM.
translation.zh: 我很骄傲的一件事 是我为IBM制作的这份协议。

translation.en: It's a grid, it's a calendar.
translation.zh: 它以简单的网格形式，是一个日历。

translation.en: At such and such a date, IBM has responsibilities, you have responsibilities.
translation.zh: 在这个日期，IBM承担责任， 你承担责任。

translation.en: Received very favorably by business.
translation.zh: 这个作法在商务领域被欣然接受了。

translation.en: And there is some good news to report today.
translation.zh: 今天我有好消息要讲。

translation.en: Each year, one in 10 taxpayers receives a notice from the IRS.
translation.zh: 每年每10个纳税人中有一个 会收到美国国税局通知。

translation.en: There are 200 million letters that go out.
translation.zh: 那就是要发出2亿封信。

translation.en: Running through this typical letter that they had, I ran it through my simplicity lab, it's pretty unintelligible.
translation.zh: 我处理了一部分典型信件， 我是在我的简单化实验室进行的， 结果是它们很让人费解。

translation.en: All the parts of the document in red are not intelligible.
translation.zh: 文件中所有标红的部分都让人费解。

translation.en: We looked at doing over 1,000 letters that cover 70 percent of their transactions in plain English.
translation.zh: 我们又看了1000多封以简单英语写的信， 它们涵盖了70%的业务。

translation.en: They have been tested in the laboratory.
translation.zh: 这些信件在我的实验室进行了测试。

translation.en: When I run it through my lab, this heat-mapping shows everything is intelligible.
translation.zh: 当我在我的实验室测试时， 热点图显示每一件事 都是简单易懂的。

translation.en: And the IRS has introduced the program.
translation.zh: 国税局已经引进了这个程序。

translation.en: (Applause) There are a couple of things going on right now that I want to bring to your attention.
translation.zh: （鼓掌） 我想让你们注意 现在正在做的一些事情。

translation.en: There is a lot of discussion now about a consumer financial protection agency, how to mandate simplicity.
translation.zh: 现在有许多讨论 是关于消费金融保护署的， 如何使其工作程序简单化。

translation.en: We see all this complexity.
translation.zh: 我们都看到它的复杂性。

translation.en: It's incumbent upon us, and this organization, I believe, to make clarity, transparency and empathy a national priority.
translation.zh: 我相信我们 和他们都有义不容辞的责任， 使国家重点项目清晰、透明 和与大众有共鸣感。

translation.en: There is no way that we should allow government to communicate the way they communicate.
translation.zh: 我们无法再允许政府 按照他们的表达方式进行表达，

translation.en: There is no way we should do business with companies that have agreements with stealth provisions and that are unintelligible.
translation.zh: 我们无法再与协议中 带有隐匿、晦涩难懂条款的公司 做生意。

translation.en: So, how are we going to change the world?
translation.zh: 那么，我们如何去改变世界？

translation.en: Make clarity, transparency and simplicity a national priority.
translation.zh: 那就是使国家重点项目清晰、透明并且简单化。

translation.en: I thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家。

translation.en: (Applause) I'm going to talk today about energy and climate.
translation.zh: （鼓掌） 我今天要谈的是能源与气候，这可能有点出人意料

translation.en: And that might seem a bit surprising because my full-time work at the Foundation is mostly about vaccines and seeds, about the things that we need to invent and deliver to help the poorest two billion live better lives.
translation.zh: 我今天要谈的是能源与气候，这可能有点出人意料 毕竟我在基金会的全职工作主要是关于疾病疫苗和农业种苗的 那些的确是需要我们发明传播，以改善世上最贫穷的二十亿人的生活的东西 那些的确是需要我们发明传播，以改善世上最贫穷的二十亿人的生活的东西

translation.en: But energy and climate are extremely important to these people -- in fact, more important than to anyone else on the planet.
translation.zh: 但事实上，能源和气候对这些人极为重要，事实上，比对地球上其他人更加重要 但事实上，能源和气候对这些人极为重要，事实上，比对地球上其他人更加重要

translation.en: The climate getting worse means that many years, their crops won't grow: There will be too much rain, not enough rain, things will change in ways that their fragile environment simply can't support.
translation.zh: 气候的持续恶化意味着他们的庄稼将多年无法生长，意味着洪涝或干旱 气候的持续恶化意味着他们的庄稼将多年无法生长，意味着洪涝或干旱 这些变化将令他们脆弱的环境无法承受 这些变化将令他们脆弱的环境无法承受

translation.en: And that leads to starvation, it leads to uncertainty, it leads to unrest.
translation.zh: 这将导致饥荒，导致动荡，导致社会骚乱

translation.en: So, the climate changes will be terrible for them.
translation.zh: 所以，气候变化将给他们带来严重后果，同时，能源价格也对他们至关重要

translation.en: Also, the price of energy is very important to them.
translation.zh: 所以，气候变化将给他们带来严重后果，同时，能源价格也对他们至关重要

translation.en: In fact, if you could pick just one thing to lower the price of, to reduce poverty, by far you would pick energy.
translation.zh: 事实上，如果只能降低一样东西的价格以减少贫困，你一定会首选能源价格 事实上，如果只能降低一样东西的价格以减少贫困，你一定会首选能源价格

translation.en: Now, the price of energy has come down over time.
translation.zh: 能源价格随着人类历史进程逐渐下降，先进文明是建立在先进能源的基础上的

translation.en: Really advanced civilization is based on advances in energy.
translation.zh: 能源价格随着人类历史进程逐渐下降，先进文明是建立在先进能源的基础上的

translation.en: The coal revolution fueled the Industrial Revolution, and, even in the 1900s we've seen a very rapid decline in the price of electricity, and that's why we have refrigerators, air-conditioning, we can make modern materials and do so many things.
translation.zh: 当年的煤炭革命推进了工业革命 早在二十世纪初,我们就迎来了电价的快速下跌,这就是我们能够享受冰箱空调的原因 早在二十世纪初,我们就迎来了电价的快速下跌,这就是我们能够享受冰箱空调的原因 我们由此可以拥有各种现代化的事物，能够做各种事情

translation.en: And so, we're in a wonderful situation with electricity in the rich world.
translation.zh: 得益于电力，我们能在一个富裕的世界里过着美妙的生活

translation.en: But, as we make it cheaper -- and let's go for making it twice as cheap -- we need to meet a new constraint, and that constraint has to do with CO2.
translation.zh: 但是，当我们进一步降低电价的时候，比如再使其便宜两倍 我们就有了一个新的限制，这个限制与二氧化碳有关 我们就有了一个新的限制，这个限制与二氧化碳有关

translation.en: CO2 is warming the planet, and the equation on CO2 is actually a very straightforward one.
translation.zh: 二氧化碳正在使全球变暖，而计算二氧化碳排放的公式其实非常简单明了 二氧化碳正在使全球变暖，而计算二氧化碳排放的公式其实非常简单明了

translation.en: If you sum up the CO2 that gets emitted, that leads to a temperature increase, and that temperature increase leads to some very negative effects: the effects on the weather; perhaps worse, the indirect effects, in that the natural ecosystems can't adjust to these rapid changes, and so you get ecosystem collapses.
translation.zh: 当前二氧化碳巨大的排放量将导致温度上升 当前二氧化碳巨大的排放量将导致温度上升 温度的升高将引起一系列非常严重的后果 比如对天气的直接影响，或对生态系统的间接影响，生态系统无法应对剧烈变化的结果就是生态系统的全面崩溃 比如对天气的直接影响，或对生态系统的间接影响，生态系统无法应对剧烈变化的结果就是生态系统的全面崩溃 比如对天气的直接影响，或对生态系统的间接影响，生态系统无法应对剧烈变化的结果就是生态系统的全面崩溃

translation.en: Now, the exact amount of how you map from a certain increase of CO2 to what temperature will be and where the positive feedbacks are, there's some uncertainty there, but not very much.
translation.zh: 二氧化碳排放增加和温度升高究竟成怎样的关系，两者间的正反馈效应为何？ 二氧化碳排放增加和温度升高究竟成怎样的关系，两者间的正反馈效应为何？ 二氧化碳排放增加和温度升高究竟成怎样的关系，两者间的正反馈效应为何？ 这中间有一些不确定因素，但不多

translation.en: And there's certainly uncertainty about how bad those effects will be, but they will be extremely bad.
translation.zh: 至于全球变暖的具体负面影响有多严重，这无法完全确定，但肯定极其严重 至于全球变暖的具体负面影响有多严重，这无法完全确定，但肯定极其严重

translation.en: I asked the top scientists on this several times: Do we really have to get down to near zero?
translation.zh: 我为此多次请教过顶尖的科学家们：我们真的一定要将二氧化碳排放降到零吗？ 我为此多次请教过顶尖的科学家们：我们真的一定要将二氧化碳排放降到零吗？

translation.en: Can't we just cut it in half or a quarter?
translation.zh: 减少到一半或四分之一不行吗？

translation.en: And the answer is that until we get near to zero, the temperature will continue to rise.
translation.zh: 他们的回答是，除非我们降到零，否则气温将持续上升，那将是一个巨大的挑战 他们的回答是，除非我们降到零，否则气温将持续上升，那将是一个巨大的挑战

translation.en: And so that's a big challenge.
translation.zh: 他们的回答是，除非我们降到零，否则气温将持续上升，那将是一个巨大的挑战

translation.en: It's very different than saying "We're a twelve-foot-high truck trying to get under a ten-foot bridge, and we can just sort of squeeze under."
translation.zh: 这不同于让一辆12英尺高的卡车通过限高10英尺的桥，只要想办法挤过去即可 这不同于让一辆12英尺高的卡车通过限高10英尺的桥，只要想办法挤过去即可

translation.en: This is something that has to get to zero.
translation.zh: 二氧化碳的排放是要彻底降到零为止

translation.en: Now, we put out a lot of carbon dioxide every year, over 26 billion tons.
translation.zh: 当前我们每年都排放大量的二氧化碳，总量超过260亿吨 当前我们每年都排放大量的二氧化碳，总量超过260亿吨

translation.en: For each American, it's about 20 tons; for people in poor countries, it's less than one ton.
translation.zh: 美国人约排放量约20吨，贫穷国家人均不到一吨，全球人均排放量约为5吨 美国人约排放量约20吨，贫穷国家人均不到一吨，全球人均排放量约为5吨

translation.en: It's an average of about five tons for everyone on the planet.
translation.zh: 美国人约排放量约20吨，贫穷国家人均不到一吨，全球人均排放量约为5吨

translation.en: And, somehow, we have to make changes that will bring that down to zero.
translation.zh: 无论如何，我们都要做出改变，直至把这个数字降到零 无论如何，我们都要做出改变，直至把这个数字降到零

translation.en: It's been constantly going up.
translation.zh: 这个数字现在还在继续上升中，只有经济波动才稍稍抑制其上升的势头

translation.en: It's only various economic changes that have even flattened it at all, so we have to go from rapidly rising to falling, and falling all the way to zero.
translation.zh: 这个数字现在还在继续上升中，只有经济波动才稍稍抑制其上升的势头 我们不但要扭转其迅速上升的势头，还要让它下降，并且一路降到零 我们不但要扭转其迅速上升的势头，还要让它下降，并且一路降到零

translation.en: This equation has four factors, a little bit of multiplication: So, you've got a thing on the left, CO2, that you want to get to zero, and that's going to be based on the number of people, the services each person's using on average, the energy on average for each service, and the CO2 being put out per unit of energy.
translation.zh: 这个二氧化碳的公式有四个因素，四者相乘 这个二氧化碳的公式有四个因素，四者相乘 等式左面是二氧化碳排放量，我们的目标是让它降到零 二氧化碳排放＝人口总数 X 人均使用的服务量 X 每单位服务平均耗用能源量 X 每单位能源的二氧化碳排放 二氧化碳排放＝人口总数 X 人均使用的服务量 X 每单位服务平均耗用能源量 X 每单位能源的二氧化碳排放 二氧化碳排放＝人口总数 X 人均使用的服务量 X 每单位服务平均耗用能源量 X 每单位能源的二氧化碳排放 二氧化碳排放＝人口总数 X 人均使用的服务量 X 每单位服务平均耗用能源量 X 每单位能源的二氧化碳排放

translation.en: So, let's look at each one of these and see how we can get this down to zero.
translation.zh: 下面让我们逐个来看各个因子，看看怎样才能将等式最终降为零 下面让我们逐个来看各个因子，看看怎样才能将等式最终降为零

translation.en: Probably, one of these numbers is going to have to get pretty near to zero.
translation.zh: 显然，我们需要至少一个因子非常接近于零，这是简单的高中代数 (老美高中才学这个？)

translation.en: Now that's back from high school algebra, but let's take a look.
translation.zh: 显然，我们需要至少一个因子非常接近于零，这是简单的高中代数 (老美高中才学这个？)♫ 我们来看一下，首先是人口

translation.en: First, we've got population.
translation.zh: 我们来看一下，首先是人口

translation.en: The world today has 6.8 billion people.
translation.zh: 目前世界上有68亿人，这将继续增长到约90亿人

translation.en: That's headed up to about nine billion.
translation.zh: 目前世界上有68亿人，这将继续增长到约90亿人

translation.en: Now, if we do a really great job on new vaccines, health care, reproductive health services, we could lower that by, perhaps, 10 or 15 percent, but there we see an increase of about 1.3.
translation.zh: 如果我们在新疫苗开发、医疗服务、生殖健康方面的工作做得卓有成效的话 如果我们在新疫苗开发、医疗服务、生殖健康方面的工作做得卓有成效的话 这个数字可能可以减少10％到15％，这样的话综合增长率约为1.3 这个数字可能可以减少10％到15％，这样的话综合增长率约为1.3

translation.en: The second factor is the services we use.
translation.zh: 第二个因子是我们使用的服务

translation.en: This encompasses everything: the food we eat, clothing, TV, heating.
translation.zh: 这包括所有东西：我们吃的食物，穿的衣服，电视，暖气，都是些非常美好的事物 这包括所有东西：我们吃的食物，穿的衣服，电视，暖气，都是些非常美好的事物

translation.en: These are very good things: getting rid of poverty means providing these services to almost everyone on the planet.
translation.zh: 这包括所有东西：我们吃的食物，穿的衣服，电视，暖气，都是些非常美好的事物 摆脱贫穷就意味着向地球上每个人提供这些服务，这个因子进一步提高才是好事 摆脱贫穷就意味着向地球上每个人提供这些服务，这个因子进一步提高才是好事

translation.en: And it's a great thing for this number to go up.
translation.zh: 摆脱贫穷就意味着向地球上每个人提供这些服务，这个因子进一步提高才是好事

translation.en: In the rich world, perhaps the top one billion, we probably could cut back and use less, but every year, this number, on average, is going to go up, and so, over all, that will more than double the services delivered per person.
translation.zh: 在发达国家里，最富裕的十亿人，或许可以控制消费，减少一些服务享受 在发达国家里，最富裕的十亿人，或许可以控制消费，减少一些服务享受 但总体而言，这个数字将会逐年上升，最终人均享受的服务，将翻一番还不止 但总体而言，这个数字将会逐年上升，最终人均享受的服务，将翻一番还不止 但总体而言，这个数字将会逐年上升，最终人均享受的服务，将翻一番还不止

translation.en: Here we have a very basic service: Do you have lighting in your house to be able to read your homework?
translation.zh: 在这一地区，我们享有的服务非常基础：你家里有没有写作业的照明灯光？ 在这一地区，我们享有的服务非常基础：你家里有没有写作业的照明灯光？

translation.en: And, in fact, these kids don't, so they're going out and reading their school work under the street lamps.
translation.zh: 这些孩子就没有，所以他们要到外面去，坐在路灯下面写作业 这些孩子就没有，所以他们要到外面去，坐在路灯下面写作业

translation.en: Now, efficiency, E, the energy for each service, here finally we have some good news.
translation.zh: 下面一个因素是效率，也就是每项服务所消耗的能源 在这一项上我们总算有了些好消息：这一因子不会持续上升

translation.en: We have something that's not going up.
translation.zh: 在这一项上我们总算有了些好消息：这一因子不会持续上升

translation.en: Through various inventions and new ways of doing lighting, through different types of cars, different ways of building buildings -- there are a lot of services where you can bring the energy for that service down quite substantially.
translation.zh: 通过各种发明和新的照明方法，通过新技术的汽车，新的建筑方式 通过各种发明和新的照明方法，通过新技术的汽车，新的建筑方式 我们可以将很多服务所消耗的能源大大降低，个别服务，甚至可以降低百分之九十 我们可以将很多服务所消耗的能源大大降低，个别服务，甚至可以降低百分之九十

translation.en: Some individual services even bring it down by 90 percent.
translation.zh: 我们可以将很多服务所消耗的能源大大降低，个别服务，甚至可以降低百分之九十

translation.en: There are other services like how we make fertilizer, or how we do air transport, where the rooms for improvement are far, far less.
translation.zh: 但另外一些服务，比如化肥生产，航空运输等，可以提升的空间较为有限 但另外一些服务，比如化肥生产，航空运输等，可以提升的空间较为有限 但另外一些服务，比如化肥生产，航空运输等，可以提升的空间较为有限

translation.en: And so, overall here, if we're optimistic, we may get a reduction of a factor of three to even, perhaps, a factor of six.
translation.zh: 所以，综合来看，对这一项的乐观估计为：我们可能能实现三到六倍的下降 所以，综合来看，对这一项的乐观估计为：我们可能能实现三到六倍的下降

translation.en: But for these first three factors now, we've gone from 26 billion to, at best, maybe 13 billion tons, and that just won't cut it.
translation.zh: 就已讨论三个因素来说，我们最多将排放量从260吨降到130亿吨，这还远远不够 就已讨论三个因素来说，我们最多将排放量从260吨降到130亿吨，这还远远不够 就已讨论三个因素来说，我们最多将排放量从260吨降到130亿吨，这还远远不够

translation.en: So let's look at this fourth factor -- this is going to be a key one -- and this is the amount of CO2 put out per each unit of energy.
translation.zh: 最后，我们来看第四个因素，也是最关键的一个 最后，我们来看第四个因素，也是最关键的一个 也就是每单位能源所排放的二氧化碳

translation.en: And so the question is: Can you actually get that to zero?
translation.zh: 我们的问题是，这一因素真的能降到零吗？

translation.en: If you burn coal, no.
translation.zh: 烧煤肯定不行，烧气也不行

translation.en: If you burn natural gas, no.
translation.zh: 烧煤肯定不行，烧气也不行

translation.en: Almost every way we make electricity today, except for the emerging renewables and nuclear, puts out CO2.
translation.zh: 我们现有的所有发电方式都会产生二氧化碳，除了发展中的的可再生能源与核能 我们现有的所有发电方式都会产生二氧化碳，除了发展中的的可再生能源与核能

translation.en: And so, what we're going to have to do at a global scale, is create a new system.
translation.zh: 所以，我们需要在全球范围内建立一个新系统，我们需要能源奇迹 所以，我们需要在全球范围内建立一个新系统，我们需要能源奇迹

translation.en: And so, we need energy miracles.
translation.zh: 所以，我们需要在全球范围内建立一个新系统，我们需要能源奇迹

translation.en: Now, when I use the term "miracle," I don't mean something that's impossible.
translation.zh: 虽然我用了“奇迹”一词，但这并不是说这件事是不可能的

translation.en: The microprocessor is a miracle. The personal computer is a miracle.
translation.zh: 微处理器是奇迹，个人电脑是奇迹，互联网及其应用也是奇迹

translation.en: The Internet and its services are a miracle.
translation.zh: 微处理器是奇迹，个人电脑是奇迹，互联网及其应用也是奇迹

translation.en: So, the people here have participated in the creation of many miracles.
translation.zh: 也就是说，在座的各位已经目睹甚至参与了很多奇迹的发生

translation.en: Usually, we don't have a deadline, where you have to get the miracle by a certain date.
translation.zh: 一般来说，我们不会对奇迹的发生设置最后期限 一般来说，我们不会对奇迹的发生设置最后期限

translation.en: Usually, you just kind of stand by, and some come along, some don't.
translation.zh: 通常，你只是袖手旁观，有些奇迹就发生了，有些则没有

translation.en: This is a case where we actually have to drive at full speed and get a miracle in a pretty tight timeline.
translation.zh: 但在低碳减排这件事上，我们必须全力以赴去推动，从而在最终期限前实现这一奇迹 但在低碳减排这件事上，我们必须全力以赴去推动，从而在最终期限前实现这一奇迹

translation.en: Now, I thought, "How could I really capture this?
translation.zh: 我想，我怎样才能更好地呈现这一问题呢？有没有一种自然生动的表达？

translation.en: Is there some kind of natural illustration, some demonstration that would grab people's imagination here?"
translation.zh: 我想，我怎样才能更好地呈现这一问题呢？有没有一种自然生动的表达？ 有没有某种演示能激发人们的想象力？

translation.en: I thought back to a year ago when I brought mosquitos, and somehow people enjoyed that.
translation.zh: 我回想起一年前我带了些蚊子到这里来，大家好像还蛮喜欢的 我回想起一年前我带了些蚊子到这里来，大家好像还蛮喜欢的

translation.en: (Laughter) It really got them involved in the idea of, you know, there are people who live with mosquitos.
translation.zh: (盖茨在上一次TED演讲上放了一些蚊子以引起与会者对疟疾的关注) 蚊子让那次的与会者真正地意识到：世界上有些人是与蚊子一起生活的 蚊子让那次的与会者真正地意识到：世界上有些人是与蚊子一起生活的

translation.en: So, with energy, all I could come up with is this.
translation.zh: 所以，今天既然在谈能源，我想到带来这个：萤火虫

translation.en: I decided that releasing fireflies would be my contribution to the environment here this year.
translation.zh: 我决定，放飞萤火虫将是我今年对这里环境做出的贡献 我决定，放飞萤火虫将是我今年对这里环境做出的贡献

translation.en: So here we have some natural fireflies.
translation.zh: 这是几只天然的萤火虫，据说不咬人，说不定它们都懒得出那个罐子

translation.en: I'm told they don't bite; in fact, they might not even leave that jar.
translation.zh: 这是几只天然的萤火虫，据说不咬人，说不定它们都懒得出那个罐子

translation.en: (Laughter) Now, there's all sorts of gimmicky solutions like that one, but they don't really add up to much.
translation.zh: 这是几只天然的萤火虫，据说不咬人，说不定它们都懒得出那个罐子 像萤火虫这样的解决能源问题有奇思妙想有很多，但实际作用相当有限 像萤火虫这样的解决能源问题有奇思妙想有很多，但实际作用相当有限

translation.en: We need solutions -- either one or several -- that have unbelievable scale and unbelievable reliability, and, although there's many directions people are seeking, I really only see five that can achieve the big numbers.
translation.zh: 我们需要的是解决方案，一个或很多个都行，极具规模性和可靠性的解决方案 我们需要的是解决方案，一个或很多个都行，极具规模性和可靠性的解决方案 我们需要的是解决方案，一个或很多个都行，极具规模性和可靠性的解决方案 尽管人们在多方探索，我觉得目前只有五个方向可以有大作为 尽管人们在多方探索，我觉得目前只有五个方向可以有大作为

translation.en: I've left out tide, geothermal, fusion, biofuels.
translation.zh: 我没有包括潮汐、地热、聚变和生物燃料等，那些都将有所贡献

translation.en: Those may make some contribution, and if they can do better than I expect, so much the better, but my key point here is that we're going to have to work on each of these five, and we can't give up any of them because they look daunting, because they all have significant challenges.
translation.zh: 我没有包括潮汐、地热、聚变和生物燃料等，那些都将有所贡献 如果它们的表现能超过我的预期，当然更好 但关键的是，我们在这五种方式上必须全部大力投入 但关键的是，我们在这五种方式上必须全部大力投入 不能因为他们看似艰巨而放弃，因为它们都包含着严峻的挑战 不能因为他们看似艰巨而放弃，因为它们都包含着严峻的挑战

translation.en: Let's look first at the burning fossil fuels, either burning coal or burning natural gas.
translation.zh: 首先来看一下化石燃料，烧煤或者烧气 首先来看一下化石燃料，烧煤或者烧气

translation.en: What you need to do there, seems like it might be simple, but it's not, and that's to take all the CO2, after you've burned it, going out the flue, pressurize it, create a liquid, put it somewhere, and hope it stays there.
translation.zh: 我们需要做的，说来简单，其实不然 需要采取的措施是把所有燃烧产生的二氧化碳，通过烟囱收集，然后加压、液化,储存 需要采取的措施是把所有燃烧产生的二氧化碳，通过烟囱收集，然后加压、液化、储存，并保证不泄漏 需要采取的措施是把所有燃烧产生的二氧化碳，通过烟囱收集，然后加压、液化、储存，并保证不泄漏

translation.en: Now we have some pilot things that do this at the 60 to 80 percent level, but getting up to that full percentage, that will be very tricky, and agreeing on where these CO2 quantities should be put will be hard, but the toughest one here is this long-term issue.
translation.zh: 当前的试验已经能做到60％至80%的水平，但要做到百分之百会十分的困难 当前的试验已经能做到60％至80%的水平，但要做到百分之百会十分的困难 并且在哪里储存那么大量的二氧化碳也容易引起争议 最困难的是这是个长期问题

translation.en: Who's going to be sure?
translation.zh: 谁能保证它呢？

translation.en: Who's going to guarantee something that is literally billions of times larger than any type of waste you think of in terms of nuclear or other things?
translation.zh: 这些废料体积十亿倍于其它核废料等废品，谁能保证长期安全？ 这些废料体积十亿倍于其它核废料等废品，谁能保证长期安全？

translation.en: This is a lot of volume.
translation.zh: 这个二氧化碳的量非常大，所以会十分困难

translation.en: So that's a tough one.
translation.zh: 这个二氧化碳的量非常大，所以会十分困难

translation.en: Next would be nuclear.
translation.zh: 下一个，核能，同样有三个大问题

translation.en: It also has three big problems: Cost, particularly in highly regulated countries, is high; the issue of the safety, really feeling good about nothing could go wrong, that, even though you have these human operators, that the fuel doesn't get used for weapons.
translation.zh: 下一个，核能，同样有三个大问题 它的成本，尤其是在高度管控的国家，非常高 安全问题，保证一切有条不紊 即使有人工操作 即使核燃料不会被用作武器

translation.en: And then what do you do with the waste?
translation.zh: 还有核废弃物要怎么处理的问题

translation.en: And, although it's not very large, there are a lot of concerns about that.
translation.zh: 虽然量并不大，但有很多令人顾虑的地方

translation.en: People need to feel good about it.
translation.zh: 好的解决方式必须让人们感到安心

translation.en: So three very tough problems that might be solvable, and so, should be worked on.
translation.zh: 这是三个困难但可能可以解决的问题 所以需要继续努力

translation.en: The last three of the five, I've grouped together.
translation.zh: 五种能源的最后三个，我会放在一起来讲

translation.en: These are what people often refer to as the renewable sources.
translation.zh: 这是人们通常称为可再生能源的三种能源

translation.en: And they actually -- although it's great they don't require fuel -- they have some disadvantages.
translation.zh: 事实上，它们虽然不需要燃料 但也有不足之处

translation.en: One is that the density of energy gathered in these technologies is dramatically less than a power plant.
translation.zh: 首先是这些技术所收集到的能源的密度，要远远小于电厂 首先是这些技术所收集到的能源的密度，要远远小于电厂

translation.en: This is energy farming, so you're talking about many square miles, thousands of time more area than you think of as a normal energy plant.
translation.zh: 这是能源农业，其规模都是平方公里级的 比常规的发电厂要大几千倍

translation.en: Also, these are intermittent sources.
translation.zh: 还有，这些能源是间歇性的

translation.en: The sun doesn't shine all day, it doesn't shine every day, and, likewise, the wind doesn't blow all the time.
translation.zh: 太阳不是一整天都有，也不是每天都有 同样，风也不是一直在吹

translation.en: And so, if you depend on these sources, you have to have some way of getting the energy during those time periods that it's not available.
translation.zh: 如果完全依赖这些来源 你还得有其它渠道来获取能源，以度过间歇期 你还得有其它渠道来获取能源，以度过间歇期

translation.en: So, we've got big cost challenges here, we have transmission challenges: for example, say this energy source is outside your country; you not only need the technology, but you have to deal with the risk of the energy coming from elsewhere.
translation.zh: 因此，我们面临巨大的成本问题 还有传输方面的挑战 比如说，某个能源来源在国外 你不仅需要能源技术 还要应对能源不在国内的相关风险

translation.en: And, finally, this storage problem.
translation.zh: 最后，是储存的问题

translation.en: And, to dimensionalize this, I went through and looked at all the types of batteries that get made -- for cars, for computers, for phones, for flashlights, for everything -- and compared that to the amount of electrical energy the world uses, and what I found is that all the batteries we make now could store less than 10 minutes of all the energy.
translation.zh: 为了让这个问题具体化，我仔细研究了所有现有的电池 为了让这个问题具体化，我仔细研究了所有现有的电池 车用的，电脑用的，手机的，手电筒的，所有的东西上用的电池 把其存储电量与世界每日消耗电能比较 我发现我们现在制造的所有电池 只能储存不到10分钟的所有能源

translation.en: And so, in fact, we need a big breakthrough here, something that's going to be a factor of 100 better than the approaches we have now.
translation.zh: 所以，实际上，我们需要一个重大的突破 需要一个比现在的技术好一百倍的解决方案 需要一个比现在的技术好一百倍的解决方案

translation.en: It's not impossible, but it's not a very easy thing.
translation.zh: 这并不是不可能的，但也不会很容易

translation.en: Now, this shows up when you try to get the intermittent source to be above, say, 20 to 30 percent of what you're using.
translation.zh: 这样，我们可以用间歇性能源 提供20%-30%所需的能量

translation.en: If you're counting on it for 100 percent, you need an incredible miracle battery.
translation.zh: 但如果你希望100%地依赖它 你需要一个非常高效的奇迹电池

translation.en: Now, how we're going to go forward on this -- what's the right approach?
translation.zh: 那么，我们怎么进行下去呢？正确的方法在哪里？

translation.en: Is it a Manhattan Project? What's the thing that can get us there?
translation.zh: 这会是一个曼哈顿计划吗？我们怎么才能到达彼岸？

translation.en: Well, we need lots of companies working on this, hundreds.
translation.zh: 我们需要很多公司来共同努力，几百家公司

translation.en: In each of these five paths, we need at least a hundred people.
translation.zh: 对五种方法中的每一种，我们都需要至少100人的团队

translation.en: And a lot of them, you'll look at and say, "They're crazy." That's good.
translation.zh: 里面的很多人，你会觉得他们很疯狂，这就对了。

translation.en: And, I think, here in the TED group, we have many people who are already pursuing this.
translation.zh: 我认为，在TED团队里 已经有很多人开始致力于此

translation.en: Bill Gross has several companies, including one called eSolar that has some great solar thermal technologies.
translation.zh: 比尔格罗斯有好几家公司，其中一个叫eSolar，拥有非常棒的太阳能发热技术 比尔格罗斯有好几家公司，其中一个叫eSolar，拥有非常棒的太阳能发热技术

translation.en: Vinod Khosla's investing in dozens of companies that are doing great things and have interesting possibilities, and I'm trying to help back that.
translation.zh: 维诺德科斯拉投资了几十家公司 他们的工作非常棒，并提出很有趣的可能性 我也计划支持他们的项目

translation.en: Nathan Myhrvold and I actually are backing a company that, perhaps surprisingly, is actually taking the nuclear approach.
translation.zh: 其实纳珊米赫沃尔德和我已经在支持一家公司 也许有点让人吃惊，但这个公司是核能方向的

translation.en: There are some innovations in nuclear: modular, liquid.
translation.zh: 在核能方面虽然近年有些小创新， 像模具化，液体使用等等

translation.en: And innovation really stopped in this industry quite some ago, so the idea that there's some good ideas laying around is not all that surprising.
translation.zh: 但其实创新在这个行业已经停止有一段时间了 所以现在出现一些好点子不是什么太奇怪的事情

translation.en: The idea of TerraPower is that, instead of burning a part of uranium -- the one percent, which is the U235 -- we decided, "Let's burn the 99 percent, the U238."
translation.zh: Terrapower的想法是：不去烧常规的铀U235 Terrapower的想法是：不去烧常规的铀U235 而是烧剩下的99%，即U238

translation.en: It is kind of a crazy idea.
translation.zh: 这是个有些疯狂的想法，但其实，人们已经讨论了很长时间

translation.en: In fact, people had talked about it for a long time, but they could never simulate properly whether it would work or not, and so it's through the advent of modern supercomputers that now you can simulate and see that, yes, with the right material's approach, this looks like it would work.
translation.zh: 这是个有些疯狂的想法，但其实，人们已经讨论了很长时间 但一直无法很好地模拟出这是否可行 有了现代超级计算机的不断升级 我们现在能做这个模拟，而且可以预见， 只要用对材料，这方案是可行的

translation.en: And, because you're burning that 99 percent, you have greatly improved cost profile.
translation.zh: 而且，因为我们烧的是以前丢弃的99%核废料 成本可以极大地降低

translation.en: You actually burn up the waste, and you can actually use as fuel all the leftover waste from today's reactors.
translation.zh: 你实际上是把废料变作燃料 再也不用担心该怎样处理现有所有核反应堆的废料，这是个很好的消息

translation.en: So, instead of worrying about them, you just take that. It's a great thing.
translation.zh: 再也不用担心该怎样处理现有所有核反应堆的废料，这是个很好的消息

translation.en: It breathes this uranium as it goes along, so it's kind of like a candle.
translation.zh: 这种技术就像蜡烛一样,逐渐烧尽铀废料

translation.en: You can see it's a log there, often referred to as a traveling wave reactor.
translation.zh: 过程就如这根柱子所示,通常被称为浪潮反应堆

translation.en: In terms of fuel, this really solves the problem.
translation.zh: 燃料的问题解决了

translation.en: I've got a picture here of a place in Kentucky.
translation.zh: 这是肯塔基州的一个废料场

translation.en: This is the leftover, the 99 percent, where they've taken out the part they burn now, so it's called depleted uranium.
translation.zh: 这就是那些废料,那99% 这就是U235已耗尽的燃料 被称作耗尽的铀

translation.en: That would power the U.S. for hundreds of years.
translation.zh: 这些可以为全美国供电数百年

translation.en: And, simply by filtering seawater in an inexpensive process, you'd have enough fuel for the entire lifetime of the rest of the planet.
translation.zh: 另外，仅仅是通过低成本的海水过滤程序 得到的燃料就足以供应地球下半辈子使用

translation.en: So, you know, it's got lots of challenges ahead, but it is an example of the many hundreds and hundreds of ideas that we need to move forward.
translation.zh: 你看, 前面还会有很多挑战 但这只是数百种方法中的一个例子 需要我们继续推进

translation.en: So let's think: How should we measure ourselves?
translation.zh: 想一想，我们要如何衡量我们的成就

translation.en: What should our report card look like?
translation.zh: 我们的成绩单应该打多少分？

translation.en: Well, let's go out to where we really need to get, and then look at the intermediate.
translation.zh: 先来看一下我们的最终目标，再倒推来看我们的中期目标 先来看一下我们的最终目标，再倒推来看我们的中期目标

translation.en: For 2050, you've heard many people talk about this 80 percent reduction.
translation.zh: 已经有很多人在谈到2050年前减碳80%

translation.en: That really is very important, that we get there.
translation.zh: 这真的非常重要，我们必须完成这个目标

translation.en: And that 20 percent will be used up by things going on in poor countries, still some agriculture, hopefully we will have cleaned up forestry, cement.
translation.zh: 而剩下那20%应是贫穷国家的份额 比如一些农业国家 但愿，我们到时已经清理了伐木业和水泥业

translation.en: So, to get to that 80 percent, the developed countries, including countries like China, will have had to switch their electricity generation altogether.
translation.zh: 所以，要达到这80% 发达国家，以及中国这些国家 需要共同改变它们的发电方式

translation.en: So, the other grade is: Are we deploying this zero-emission technology, have we deployed it in all the developed countries and we're in the process of getting it elsewhere?
translation.zh: 另外一级是，我们是否部署了零排放技术 我们是否在所有发达国家里都采用了该项技术 并且在向其他地区推广的过程中

translation.en: That's super important.
translation.zh: 这点非常重要

translation.en: That's a key element of making that report card.
translation.zh: 这是交出优秀答卷的关键因素

translation.en: So, backing up from there, what should the 2020 report card look like?
translation.zh: 从2050年往回推，我们2020年的成绩应该是怎样呢？

translation.en: Well, again, it should have the two elements.
translation.zh: 嗯，一样会有两个部分

translation.en: We should go through these efficiency measures to start getting reductions: The less we emit, the less that sum will be of CO2, and, therefore, the less the temperature.
translation.zh: 我们应该仔细审查那些衡量效率的标准以开始减少排放 我们排放的越少，二氧化碳总量就越少 温度也就越低

translation.en: But in some ways, the grade we get there, doing things that don't get us all the way to the big reductions, is only equally, or maybe even slightly less, important than the other, which is the piece of innovation on these breakthroughs.
translation.zh: 但从某个角度来说，我们在2020年取得的成绩 做一些有所减排但并非大量减排的事 仅仅等同于,或低轻于另一件事情的重要性 那就是带来关键突破的那些创新

translation.en: These breakthroughs, we need to move those at full speed, and we can measure that in terms of companies, pilot projects, regulatory things that have been changed.
translation.zh: 我们需要全速达成这些技术突破 我们可以用参与的公司的数目, 试验项目，或是调控政策的变化 来衡量

translation.en: There's a lot of great books that have been written about this.
translation.zh: 关于这个话题有许多很好的书

translation.en: The Al Gore book, "Our Choice" and the David McKay book, "Sustainable Energy Without the Hot Air."
translation.zh: 比如，戈尔的《我们的选择》 大卫麦基的《不再炽热的可持续能源》

translation.en: They really go through it and create a framework that this can be discussed broadly, because we need broad backing for this.
translation.zh: 他们用心研究, 并且构建了一个框架 便于对该问题的广泛讨论 因为我们需要对这一问题的广泛支持

translation.en: There's a lot that has to come together.
translation.zh: 需要多方大力协作

translation.en: So this is a wish.
translation.zh: 这是一个愿望

translation.en: It's a very concrete wish that we invent this technology.
translation.zh: 我们发明这项技术是个非常具体非常现实的愿望

translation.en: If you gave me only one wish for the next 50 years -- I could pick who's president, I could pick a vaccine, which is something I love, or I could pick that this thing that's half the cost with no CO2 gets invented -- this is the wish I would pick.
translation.zh: 如果我能为下个50年许一个愿望 我可以选择谁来当总统 或者选择一个疫苗，那是我热爱的事业 或者选择能源这件事 发明出能将能源价格减半并且零排放的技术 我肯定会选择能源

translation.en: This is the one with the greatest impact.
translation.zh: 这将是影响最大的一个
